API¶

Constants¶

Properties constants:¶

SIZE  = 6 # stat.ST_SIZE
ATIME = 7 # stat.ST_ATIME
MTIME = 8 # stat.ST_MTIME
CTIME = 9 # stat.ST_CTIME

Access constants:¶

These can be used with the ispath function. i.e ispath(EXIST)

EXIST      = 0 # os.F_OK
EXECUTABLE = 1 # os.X_OK
WRITABLE   = 2 # os.W_OK
READABLE   = 4 # os.R_OK

Separators constants:¶

CURDIR  = os.curdir
PARDIR  = os.pardir
PATHSEP = os.pathsep
DIRSEP  = os.sep
EXTSEP  = os.extsep

Functions¶

General functions:¶

cwd()¶

return current working directory.

chd(path)¶

change current working directory.

Properties as functions:¶

size(path)¶

return size.

atime(path)¶

return access time.

mtime(path)¶

return modified time.

ctime(path)¶

return creation time.

Path Components as functions:¶

full(path)¶

return full path (Absolute path).

path(path)¶

return given path.

drive(path)¶

return drive part.

dir(path)¶

return path without filename.

filedir(path)¶

return file dir.

file(path)¶

return name with extension.

name(path)¶

return name without extension.

ext(path)¶

return extension.

General path functions:¶

join(path, path[, path, ...])¶

join two or more paths.

stat(path)¶

return properties.

list(path, pattern='')¶

list contents of path.

dirs(path, pattern='')¶

list dirs.

files(path, pattern='')¶

list files.

chprop(path, mode=None, times=None)¶

change properties of a path.

walk(path)¶

walk path.

Note

This function is not yet implemented.

Conditional path functions:¶

ispath(path, access)¶

check path permission.

isdir(path)¶

check if path is a dir.

isfile(path)¶

check if path is a file.

islink(path)¶

check if path is a link.

ismount(path)¶

check if path is a mount.

isempty(path)¶

check weather the dir or file is empty.

High Level path functions:¶

move(oldpath, newpath)¶

move path.

rename(oldpath, newpath)¶

rename path.

copy(oldpath, newpath)¶

copy path.

create(path, type='dir', mode=0o777)¶

create path.

delete(path)¶

delete path.

Warning

This function will delete the file or dir, weather it is empty or not.

Classes¶

class Properties(path)¶

Properties of a path.

size¶
atime¶
mtime¶
ctime¶
class Components(path)¶

Components of a path.

full¶
path¶
drive¶
dir¶
filedir¶
file¶
name¶
ext¶
class Path(path)¶

Path object, represent a path to OS file or dir.

Path Components:

full¶
path¶
drive¶
dir¶
filedir¶
file¶
name¶
ext¶

Path Properties:

size¶
atime¶
mtime¶
ctime¶

General path methods:

join(path[, path, ...])¶

join two or more paths.

stat()¶

return properties.

list(pattern='')¶

list contents of path.

dirs(pattern='')¶

list dirs.

files(pattern='')¶

list files.

chprop(mode=None, times=None)¶

change properties of a path.

walk()¶

walk path.

Note

This method is not yet implemented.

Conditional path methods:

ispath(access)¶

check path permission.

isdir()¶

check if path is a dir.

isfile()¶

check if path is a file.

islink()¶

check if path is a link.

ismount()¶

check if path is a mount.

isempty()¶

check weather the dir or file is empty.

High Level path methods:

move(newpath)¶

move path.

rename(newpath)¶

rename path.

copy(newpath)¶

copy path.

create(type='dir', mode=0o777)¶

create path.

delete()¶

delete path.

Warning

This method will delete the file or dir, weather it is empty or not.

class HttpPath(path)¶

Path object, represent a path to URL.

Subclass of Path.

Exceptions:¶

exception PathError¶
